patthana16.81:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.81:4.3: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.81:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
